pages.text: Combining Siren Kelp with Dirt can can create a type of farmland that does not need water.$(br2)Right-clicking the Dirt block with a Hoe turns it into Farmland, and right-clicking it with a Shovel turns it back into Dirt.$(br2)When it rains, it triggers infused bubbles, which regularly applies growth to crops planted on the block..
Stepping on top of the Infused Farmland does not destroy crops nor turns it back to Infused Dirt.$(br2)You can plant Sugar Canes without needing water source nearby.
You can plant $(l:hexalia:resources/herbs)Herbs$() on the Infused Dirt, and then apply Bonemeal to duplicate them.
